idea:
‘Cake N Me’ was incepted in the Year 2020 by two young passionate entrepreneur. It all started with a wide Range of Patisserie and a personal touch of hand made products with love which includes mouthwatering cakes, pastries, brownies, bread, savouries, snacks, chocolates and many more.

Our Overwhelming and wide range of over 350 different varieties of desserts, cakes, mousses and brownies will definitely tranquilize your taste buds and add a sweet lining to your loving memories.

We are up to date with latest technologies and having a different team to look after Production, Marketing and Events, Logistics & Franchise.

Our Products are made from Rich Chocolates and non-dairy creams giving you the immense pleasure of enjoying the fine taste.

name: Road Riders

idea:
Vision:

A " For Purpose" entity to empower latent workforce of women professionals to resume work after a career break and contribute to build women workforce for a stronger India and a beautiful world.


PinkBlazer pledges to use 50% of the profit earned towards higher education of girlchild in rural areas and under privileged communities.


Business Model


-An online meeting place for all women professionals willing to resume work after the career break and corporates/ startups/ SMEs looking for the expertise

- Nominal charge for registration and listing (similar to online market place) and % of assignment fee as transaction fee.

-Links of upskilling courses/ seminars/ webinars

-Community support to inspire/ guide/ collaborate
name: PinkBlazer
